BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-21 16:30
Subject: Look Back at Wellbeing Week 2024, Humanitarian Support for Lebanon, Coffee with Tracey, Reintroducing Kronos, Dubai Chamber of Commerce ESG Label, Shop Sirocco 1, Mandatory Acceptable Use Policy & Shawka Hump Trail Race Offer
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/HCeDI-xgGUmm-kSXfUTBzQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/HCeDI-xgGUmm-kSXfUTBzQ/550511/F3EEEF00C2E8DE43310CE78E59941069/wellbeing-week-recap-banner.gif> 	

A LOOK BACK AT OUR WELLBEING WEEK 2024


Thank you to everyone who was a part of our 3rd Annual Wellbeing Week.

This year, our Wellbeing Week took place in 8 countries (UAE, KSA, Egypt, India, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and Jordan) giving our store, warehouse, and office teams the opportunity to benefit from different wellbeing services covering the 5 dimensions of wellbeing.

chunks.text:
This year, our Wellbeing Week took place in 8 countries (UAE, KSA, Egypt, India, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and Jordan) giving our store, warehouse, and office teams the opportunity to benefit from different wellbeing services covering the 5 dimensions of wellbeing.

With over 2900 participants, the sessions included health checkups, workshops, and experiential activities that support our team members on their wellbeing journey, instill a self-care mindset, and reinforce wellbeing as part of our workplace culture.

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f59301%252fa-look-back-at-our-wellbeing-week-2024%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWZmxR7xoPAT4OpgzSS%252f5YkU%252bontXL1Z1Po1hr5Ejmt7%252fIhegZRxQj0mubo0Y1DIWwNbUnNlB3uVimZgt55Dcs4Yq8h7annyubxg6lT%252bymqs1RfJ5IFTnjdZOcLu3F6kftP1yVMdBS5OMfv0xuvojMoJ%252b6gnkGMf%252fIh0DDOoYV8kQa%252fRc4xZTc0vCOC3e4zj54DVUWBx%252fvqIJHiz7TbBZzsU%252bqrROX62A0nZU5Gt4ovJO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca9782882d7f549f5f30808dcf1cc1c4f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638651106165410292%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=bLikuLl%2FJz6dwbIGhpLc1AqAOrK90RBkfisgFBgp8ms%3D&reserved=0>

HUMANITARIAN SUPPORT FOR LEBANON 

As a Group we have partnered with Emirates Red Crescent to support the people of Lebanon. 

For monetary donations, you can DONATE HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f230030904345444%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWZmxR7xoPAT4OpgzSS%252f5YkU%252bontXL1Z1Po1hr5Ejmt7%252fIhegZRxQj0mubo0Y1DIWwNbUnNlB3uVimZgt55Dcs4Yq8h7annyubxg6lT%252bymqs1RfJ5IFTnjdZOcLu3F6kftP1yVMdBS5OMfv0xuvojMoJ%252b6gnkGMf%252fIh0DDOoYV8kQa%252fRc4xZTc0vCOC3e4zj54DVUWBx%252fvqIJHiz7TbBZzsU%252bqrROX62A0nZU5Gt4ovJO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca9782882d7f549f5f30808dcf1cc1c4f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638651106165460251%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ixx5HCzuYqaKHge8mT2v9GNN4Yx12u5simQzvMGoMjw%3D&reserved=0>  and the amount will be deducted from your salary.

ENHANCING SAFETY AND SERVICE QUALITY FOR OUR STORE CONSULTANTS

As part of our commitment to improve store operations and prioritise the safety of our team members, we are reintroduction Kronos across all MC stores. Kronos is a powerful scheduling tool that helps us effectively track staff coverage, boosts productivity, and fairly manage working hours for our dedicated store teams. 
Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f59314%252fenhancing-safety-and-service-quality-for-our-store-consultants-with-kronos%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWZmxR7xoPAT4OpgzSS%252f5YkU%252bontXL1Z1Po1hr5Ejmt7%252fIhegZRxQj0mubo0Y1DIWwNbUnNlB3uVimZgt55Dcs4Yq8h7annyubxg6lT%252bymqs1RfJ5IFTnjdZOcLu3F6kftP1yVMdBS5OMfv0xuvojMoJ%252b6gnkGMf%252fIh0DDOoYV8kQa%252fRc4xZTc0vCOC3e4zj54DVUWBx%252fvqIJHiz7TbBZzsU%252bqrROX62A0nZU5Gt4ovJO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca9782882d7f549f5f30808dcf1cc1c4f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638651106165535364%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zsZNr%2FxGmsUci%2Bxraut7g8HBS38HAzlhMCQo5MUhPbM%3D&reserved=0>

Kronos is a powerful scheduling tool that helps us effectively track staff coverage, boosts productivity, and fairly manage working hours for our dedicated store teams.

THE GROUP WAS AWARDED THE DUBAI CHAMBER OF COMMERCE ESG LABEL

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/HCeDI-xgGUmm-kSXfUTBzQ/550521/12FEC130EE36327DA6E6365E1D0025FA/screen-shot-2024-10-21-at-3-21-27-pm.png> 	
Our Group was awarded the Dubai Chamber of Commerce Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Label. 

This new and upgraded label was awarded to 27 companies in the UAE that are leading the way in the adoption of sustainable business practices. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/HCeDI-xgGUmm-kSXfUTBzQ/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	

Step into an immersive world of skincare at The Skincare Edition: Unfiltered, the Middle East's first-of-its-kind event for skincare professionals and enthusiasts.  

Explore exclusive experiences brought to you by global brands, offering unique skin analyses and valuable insights into skincare practices and active ingredients.
